condition.text: (obama|trump|pence|hillary|bernie|libertarian|gary johnson|jill stein|green party|election|republican|democrat|democratic|political|politics|politician|clinton foundation|electoral|ben carson|chris christie|giuliani|ivanka|inauguration|kellyanne conway|sean spicer|tillerson|muslimban|gorsuch|betsy devos|elizabeth warren|Mitch McConnell|jeff sessions)

filters.title: Election/Politics 2017
filters.description: Filter any posts related to U.S. Politics

actions.custom_note: Sponsored Post hidden (Experimental 1108.A)! Click to show/hide this ad.

filters.title: Sponsored/Suggested Posts (Experimental 2018-11-08 part A)
filters.description: please place BEFORE existing Sponsored filter(s)

actions.custom_note: Sponsored Post hidden (Experimental 1108.B)! Click to show/hide this ad.

filters.title: Sponsored/Suggested Posts (Experimental 2018-11-08 part B)
filters.description: please place right AFTER the main Experimental 11-08 A filter

filters.title: Sponsored/Suggested Posts (Experimental part C, 2019-02-15)
filters.description: order between Sponsored filters not important; parts A/B/OLD are optional

actions.custom_note: Sponsored Post hidden! Click to show/hide this ad.

filters.title: Hide Sponsored/Suggested Posts (2019-02-03)
filters.description: Hide all Sponsored and Suggested posts from the news feed

actions.custom_note: Sponsored Post hidden (OLD)! Click to show/hide this ad.

filters.title: Hide Sponsored/Suggested Posts (OLD)
filters.description: Hide all Sponsored and Suggested posts from the news feed (OLD version)

filters.title: Hide Game of Thrones Spoilers til Monday
filters.description: Hide posts with any mention of Game of Thrones but only on Sunday night and show a spolier warning note instead. Show them again on Monday.

filters.title: Hide all posts about Game of Thrones
filters.description: Hide posts with any mention of Game of Thrones.

filters.title: Create Game/App Tabs
filters.description: Create tabs for filtered views of posts by apps or games, but don't remove them from the News Feed

filters.title: Create Author Tabs
filters.description: Create tabs for filtered views of posts by different people, but don't remove them from the News Feed

filters.title: I F'ing Love ...
filters.description: Replace any Page names like "I F'ing Love Science" with "IFL"

actions.custom_note: Spoiler Alert! Click to show/hide this post.
actions.css: border:1px dashed red; font-size:12px; padding: 5px; opacity:1; margin:5px 0; color:red;

filters.title: Hide Spoilers
filters.description: If a post contains the word "spoiler" anywhere in it, hide it and display a message to click to show the post.

filters.title: Hide "Shared Memories"
filters.description: Hide re-posts of old memories in the news feed

filters.title: Hide "People You May Know"
filters.description: Filter the "People You May Know" story that appears in the News Feed occasionally.

condition.text: (.*(?:^(.*) commented on this\.(?:(?! \2 $).)*$|was mentioned in a post|was live| likes | liked |reacted to this|was tagged in|replied to a comment).*)

filters.title: Friend Activity Stories
filters.description: Filter stories about things your friends liked, were tagged in, etc, but which they didn't actually create.

filters.title: Saved Posts Reminder
filters.description: Hide posts in the news feed that highlight things you've recently Saved to Facebook, which they are reminding you about.

filters.title: Pokemon Go
filters.description: Move posts about Pokemon Go to a tab
